message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
Alice,  $110 is a bit steep for me. I'd be happy to pay $105.  What do you say?

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not quite ready to let it go for $105. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $108. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product. What do you think?
